sprites
Class ImageInfo

java.lang.Object
  sprites.ImageInfo

public class ImageInfo
extends java.lang.Object

CLASS FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
used to remember the details about the image to prevent multiple copies of same image being loaded and stored.

Author:
Peter Lager
